generated_body: The article titled "Divers salvage 100-year-old liquor from WWI shipwreck" is likely to explore the recent discovery of liquor bottles recovered from a sunken ship dating back to World War I. The piece may also touch on the techniques used by divers during the salvage operation and the implications of such finds for understanding wartime culture and maritime history.
